content: times double_crochet single_crochet in the next double_crochet single_crochet below chain 4 miss the next chain space and the next 2 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st in the last st make 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s and 1 dtr treble_crochet the chart patterns are simple patterns to follow they show you how to make the first 10 row the pattern then is a simple repeat of row 9 and 10 these charts show how to start the border pattern and how to do the centre section my finished shawl measured 71 inches across with a drop of 31 inches i would recommend blocking your finished shawl to bring out the design more i really hope you enjoy making this pattern i had so much fun creating it if you have any problems please contact me at suzy@daisyboo net happy hooking suzy xx
